[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@svelte-put/inline-svg](./inline-svg.md) &gt; [InlineSvgActionConfig](./inline-svg.inlinesvgactionconfig.md) &gt; [autoDimensions](./inline-svg.inlinesvgactionconfig.autodimensions.md)

## InlineSvgActionConfig.autoDimensions property

automatically calculate dimensions from the available attributes of both the local SVG element (on which action is used) and the remote SVG

For example, if you specify only `width` to the local SVG element, the height will automatically be calculated from the remote SVG

**Signature:**

```typescript
autoDimensions?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

For this to work, width &amp; height must be "extractable" from the remote element, that is, the remote SVG must either have the `viewBox` or both `width` and `height` attributes that is in the same unit.
